metadata.title: CVE-2019-7664 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In elfutils 0.175, a negative-sized memcpy is attempted in elf_cvt_note in libelf/note_xlate.h because of an incorrect overflow check. Crafted elf input causes a segmentation fault, leading to denial of service (program crash).

criterions.comment: elfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
